name: ansible-variable-lookup
description: Helps finding the definition and usages of ansible variables

ansible-variable-lookup.enableOnLanguage.description:
On what languages should this extension be enabled, adding languages to this list will make the extension register with vscode on when a file of the given type is open. For example this extension will not run on a plaintext file, but if you have templated values in a specific file type, you can add them here. 

Requires a restart of the extension (or vscode).

ansible-variable-lookup.enableHover.description: If not enabled the variables values can still be found using the "Go To Definition" context menu or the F12 key (or the key that is configured for "Go To Definition").

ansible-variable-lookup.truncateHoverLin.description: Long values can be truncated in the hover popup. Set the max length of the link path to display here. Only applicable to the pop-up hover.

ansible-variable-lookup.truncateHoverVal.description: Long values can be truncated in the hover popup. Set the max length of the content of the value to display here. Only applicable to the pop-up hover.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
